RTCIceCandidatePairStatsBytesSent.summary: The bytesSent property of the dictionary indicates the total number of payload bytes that have been sent so far on the connection described by the candidate pair.
RTCIceCandidatePairStatsBytesSent.value: An integer value indicating the total number of bytes sent so far on the connection described by this candidate pair.Only data bytes are counted; overhead such as padding, headers, and the like are not included in this count.
